name: Holy Crap I Just Died and Now I Have to Justify All My Sins
name_original: Holy Crap I Just Died and Now I Have to Justify All My Sins
description:
"Holy Crap I Just Died and Now I Have to Justify All My Sins So I Dont Go to Hell but It Could Be Worse I Mean I Could Be Playing League of Legends Right Now" is an extremely stupid visual novel where you must justify all of (3) sins you made on earth so that Saint Peter lets you into heaven.

Made for Lame Jam 12 (theme was "judgement day")
